content.p: 2023-24 'Foundation Year' programmes in the below refer to those programmes delivered by the University of Nottingham, including 'Gateway' programmes, and therefore do not include programmes delivered by University of Nottingham International College (UNIC). Membership Chair (to also be a member of QSC and the Joint Academic Board): Dr Beverley Allan (BA) Deputy Director of Student Recruitment (Widening Participation and Outreach): Ms Emma Szembek (ES) Representatives for Foundation Year Provision: Learning and Teaching Director, UNIC: Jade Kimberley (JK) Students' Union Education Officer: Tu Anh Do (TAD) Secretary: David Preece (DP) Optional attendees: (Updated November 2023) Return to Committees list Trent Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 115 951 5761 fax: +44 115 951 5739 email: registrars@nottingham.ac.uk
